description: Executes an action on a target resource.

parameters.name: targetResource
parameters.description: The resource the action will be taken on. The ID of the asset, in UUID format.

nested_params.name: assetId
nested_params.description: The ID of the asset, in UUID format.

parameters.name: actionDefinitionId
parameters.description: The ID of the action definition.

parameters.name: actionPayload
parameters.description: The JSON payload of the action. The payload of the action in a JSON string.

nested_params.name: stringValue
nested_params.description: The payload of the action in a JSON string.
